config.use-system-ime.name: Use System IME
config.use-system-ime.tooltip: Whether to use system IME instead of ingame IME when typing. Turn this on if the ingame IME panel doesn't support your IME. Not recommended to turn it on.

config.composition-text-color.tooltip: The color of the composition text in the ingame IME panel.
